project.name: MapComplete Indoors
project.description: On this map, publicly accessible indoor places are shown

tags.description: The MapComplete theme Indoors has a layer indoors showing features with this tag

The MapComplete theme Indoors has a layer indoors showing features with this tag
The MapComplete theme Indoors has a layer indoors showing features with this tag

The layer 'indoors allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
